name: plugin-twilio-infra
description: Develop and deploy your Twilio infrastructure using code
author: Kaique Lupo Leite <klupo@twilio.com>

infra.description: Locally develop, debug and deploy infrastructure to Twilio project describing it as code

infra:new.description: Creates a new project based on a template

infra:deploy.description: Deploys and updates resources described in this directory to a Twilio project

infra:preview.description: Previews changes related to resources described in this directory and mapped to a Twilio project

infra:destroy.description: Destroy an existing stack and the deployed resources

infra:environment:new.description: Create a new environment for the current Twilio project

infra:environment:get.description: Get the deployment environment set for the current project

infra:environment:set.description: Set the deployment environment for the current project
